ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed
Class RemoteDistributedBackend

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.DistributedBackend
      ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.RemoteDistributedBackend
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteSGEBackend
public abstract class RemoteDistributedBackend
extends DistributedBackend

This class forms a baseclass for all distributed resources that must be contacted through a remote submit node (or front node) reachable through SSH.
